hackathon-requirements:
Submissions are due on Devpost 
You must include videos, photos, or screenshots of the working product and a link to the source code (GitHub, etc.) of your project.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Overall winner of the Energy & Environment Track. Win $400 to your favorite charity, plus an adorable plushie! If you're wondering about which charity to give to, check out givewell.org.
Overall winner of the Health & Wellness track. Win $400 to your favorite charity, plus an adorable plushie! If you're wondering about which charity to give to, check out givewell.org.
Overall winner of the Inequality Track. Win $400 to your favorite charity, plus an adorable plushie! If you're wondering about which charity to give to, check out givewell.org.
Overall winner of the Education Track. Win $400 to your favorite charity, plus an adorable plushie! If you're wondering about which charity to give to, check out givewell.org.

Best hack that has majority (>= 50%) novice hackers on the team. A novice hacker is defined as someone who has never been to a hackathon. Win $200 to your favorite charity, plus an adorable plushie! If you're wondering about which charity to give to, check out givewell.org.

This is an open ended prize. There are no specifications about what we want to see specifically. We want the participants to use their imaginations. The prize will be $1000 cash to be split amongst the winning team.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Esri - Prize for the best use of the Esri Platform
Facebook - Best overall use of the Facebook API

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Winning team gets an XBox One!
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Microsoft - Best use of Microsoft APIs

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Winning team gets 1 bitcoin & guaranteed interviews with Coinbase.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Coinbase - Best use of the Bitcoin or Ethereum blockchains

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Use your tech skills for good and hack online harassment. Build a software solution that can help reduce the frequency and/or severity of online harassment. Win a HackHarassment Swag Bag.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS
Zoho - Best Use of Zoho API

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Fitzpatrick Center for Interdisciplinary Engineering, Medicine and Applied Sciences, 101 Science Dr, Durham, NC 27705, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: As an event dedicated to social good, we're both looking for technical skill and an interesting and creative solution to a social problem in one of our four tracks: Inequality, Energy & Environment, Health & Wellness, and Education.

Does it solve the problem that is presented?
How well does the team explain their solution?
How well does the team understand the problem that they face in that topic?

How innovative is the idea?
Is it a unique or clever solution to the problem?

Do they solve difficult technical problem(s)?
Does the project actually work?
Does the app/project do what it’s supposed to do?
Is the design clean?
Are the features accessible?

hackathon-location-address: Fitzpatrick Center for Interdisciplinary Engineering, Medicine and Applied Sciences, 101 Science Dr, Durham, NC 27705, USA
hackathon-description-header: Use your technical skills for social good!
